channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- 800xA Batch Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- 800xA Batch Management

item.title: CVE-2020-8488|2024-08-04T10:03:44.822Z -- abb -- 800xa%20batch%20management
item.description: Insufficient protection of the inter-process communication functions in ABB System 800xA Batch Management (all published versions) enables an attacker authenticated on the local system to inject data, affecting User Interface update during batch execution and/or compare/printing functionalities.
